__GlobalAccessControlManaged_init(addres.details: this is assumed to be used in the initializer of the inhereiting contract

params._globalAccessControl: global access control which is pinged to allow / deny access to permissioned calls by role

params.amount: The amount to transfer. If greater than the claimable amount, the maximum is transferred.
params.recipient: The account to transfer unlocked tokens to.
The account to check the claimable balance of.

returns._0: The number of tokens currently claimable.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

setVestingDuration(uint256).details: does not affect currently active vests, only future vests

params._unlockBegin: The time at which unlocking of tokens will begin.
params.recipient: The account for which vesting will be setup.

claim(address,uint256).notice: Claims the caller's tokens that have been unlocked, sending them to `recipient`.

claimableBalance(address).notice: Returns the maximum number of tokens currently claimable by `recipient`.

vest(address,uint256,uint256).notice: note that a given address can only have one active vest at a time.adding a new vest before claiming completely from the previous will re-lock the previous amount according to the new vesting timeline.

documentation.text:
@title Staked Citadel Vesting Utility.
 @notice Time-locks tokens on users' behalf according to an unlock schedule.
